channel.title: Web Development on Kevin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Kevin's Blog

item.title: Building a project layout in Golang
item.description:
My experience when setting up a new Golang project

In a recent project, I am asked to create a new boilerplate project in Golang follows Domain Driven Development architecture. The project becomes a standard project for all new services. It is a great opportunity for me to deep dive into the Golang ecosystem and DDD concepts. I have learnt many things when working on this project and I will share them with you in a series of Golang blog post.

item.title: Tracking Email Activity Ses
item.description: This post explains in detailed how to track email sending activities using SNS HTTPs endpoint.
